alert.note: Alert for Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:59AM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Moderate wind will cause heavy drifting snow and low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...The upper Snake River plain, including the cities of Idaho Falls and Rexburg, and the towns of Saint Anthony and Chester. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will reduce visibility while driving. The only solution is to slow down. Drifting snow may cause temporary road closures as efforts to clear snow are hampered. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
